questions.question: This is the 6th chocolate you ……………………… today.
questions.description: Use the present perfect after this is the first/second/third etc.

questions.question: I ………………………. a strange experience yesterday.
questions.description: Use the simple past with definite past time expressions.

questions.question: It is time you ……………………….. smoking.
questions.description: A simple past is used after it is time to refer to the present or future.

questions.question: I would rather you ……………………….. home now.
questions.description: A simple past is used after would rather to refer to the present or future.

questions.question: He asked if I ………………………… his wallet.
Although she ……………………….. hard, she could not pass the exam.
She broke down when she ……………………….. the news.
I regret ……………………….. school at fourteen.
questions.description: Regret is followed by an ing form to refer to the past.

questions.question: Despite being clever, she …………………….. industry.
questions.description: Lack is not normally used in the ing form.

questions.question: As he was born in a poor family, he …………………………. great hardship during his childhood.
questions.description: Use the simple past to talk about finished events that are in no way related to the present.

questions.question: I conceded to his demands because I …………………………. to provoke him.
